events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position early this morning, including a detailed resume and cover letter.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department for further consideration due to relevant software development experience.
Recruiter Sarah has been assigned to the candidate to ensure smooth communication and to schedule the next steps in the engineering recruitment process.
An initial screening call was conducted, where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of devops practices and software architecture fundamentals.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding skills and problem-solving capabilities with the engineering team.
